title: Homestyle Bacon pepper
Desc: A beef steak, smoked paprika mayo, two slices of melted cheese with cheddar and two slices of bacon in a brioche bun.

title: Chicken salsa cheese
Desc: A crispy breaded chicken combined with a salsa sauce, salad and mayo in sesame bun.

title: Cheeseburger
Desc: A steak of 100% beef, chopped onions, pickles, mustard, ketchup and slice of melted cheese with cheddar in a toasted bun.

title: Big tasty chicken menu
Desc: Crispy breaded chicken, tasty sauce, slices of elemmental cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a sesame bun, fries and cold drink.

title: The mafia
Desc: Organic pizza dough tomato, cheese, ham and pepperoni.

title: Lasagne
Desc: Meat sauce, bechamel sauce, pasta plates and cheese.

title: Bruschetta
Desc: Garlic bread with cheese and fresh tomato.

title: Carpaccio di bresaola
Desc: Thin slices of veal, olive oil, arugula and parmesan.

title: Calzone
Desc: Baked pizza with tomato, cheese, cooked Italian ham and mushrooms.
